FAILURES!!!
Tests run: 173,  Failures: 5,  Errors: 0

I fixed the Exception test failures - the problem was that the java debug ui 
was present, which set the "stop on uncaught" exceptions option by default. The 
tests needed this option off.

Fixed. All tests were fixed by turing off the preference - which is done once 
at the beginning of the test suite.

traces.message: suspended, but not by exception  breakpoint  expected:<org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.breakpoints.JavaExceptionBreakpoin t@4405115b> but  was:<org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.breakpoints.JavaExceptionBreakpoint@8f>
